title: (Gameplay) speaking of Tristana problems...
body: Tristana is having trouble with her haunted cannon... It has been kind enough not to cause any game play trouble but is a massive eyesore... I have only confirmed this to happen with riot girl Tristana her basic skin was fine when I tried all the emotes. If some one could check other skins that would be nice...

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're working on a fix!
Do all of her skins do it or just some? I haven't noticed this issue!!
Just Riot girl that I can test the basic is fine...
